channel.title: Help with little things please
channel.description: OK so I just finished with my server except I run into 4 small problems 1.) item bonuses are to low how can I edit 2.) No charachter has a head if you put on helm you do but if you take it off your head dissapears 3.) I need to add food into my shops but it always says invalid syntax try this 4.) my pickup codes for admin and owner wont work only one I can do is santa If anyone knows how to fix these I will make you mod on my server im pretty sure there small I have never had these problems thou thats why im confused im on msn if thats easier for you add me deshawn82@hotmail.com or post here thanx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 02:59:30 pm[/size][hr]come on any one[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 03:24:12 pm[/size][hr]can anyone at least take a shot in the dark and tell me what they think will fix it

item.title: Help with little things please
item.dc:creator: @deshawn82 deshawn82
item.description:
@deshawn82 wrote:

OK so I just finished with my server except I run into 4 small problems
1.) item bonuses are to low how can I edit
2.) No charachter has a head if you put on helm you do but if you take it off your head dissapears
3.) I need to add food into my shops but it always says invalid syntax try this
4.) my pickup codes for admin and owner wont work only one I can do is santa
If anyone knows how to fix these I will make you mod on my server im pretty sure there small I have never had these problems thou thats why im confused im on msn if thats easier for you add me deshawn82@hotmail.com or post here thanx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 02:59:30 pm[/size][hr]come on any one[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 03:24:12 pm[/size][hr]can anyone at least take a shot in the dark and tell me what they think will fix it
